description: The best creamy, crunchy waldorf salad recipe. We've added turkey and avocado to take this classic salad of apple, celery and walnuts from a side to a main event.
name: Turkey Waldorf Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange spinach, celery, avocado, cabbage and turkey on a platter. Drizzle with orange mayonnaise. Serve topped with cranberry mixture, walnuts and parsley.
Arrange spinach, celery, avocado, cabbage and turkey on a platter. Drizzle with orange mayonnaise. Serve topped with cranberry mixture, walnuts and parsley.
